Package github.jackyliao123.algebra

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Algebra
    Used for solving system of linear equations
    Evaluate
    This is used to evaluate the equation as a regular expression
    Matrix
    Used for solving the parsed equations
    Num
    This class stores the coefficient for each unknown number
    Rational
    The rational representation for the numbers used in algebra solver
    SolverGUI
    The GUI for algebra solver
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InfiniteSolutionException
    Thrown when infinite solutions are found
    NoSolutionException
    Thrown when no solution is found
    ParserException
    Used for exception that occurred when parsing the equation
